short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display Hako Calendar Note button on Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: - If you are using web app https://calendar.ha-ko.io. This extension will help you create event notes easily by displaying Hake Note button on your Google Calendar.  - Let's press the note button on your calendar event and the extension will redirect you to Hako Calendar note page.
